metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14295 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A SQL injection issue in color.php in Cacti 1.2.12 allows an admin toinject SQL via the filter parameter. This can lead to remote commandexecution because the product accepts stacked queries.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14295` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
